resources.string: CREATE TABLE MESSAGE ( ID TEXT PRIMARY KEY , SenderID INTEGER , ReceiverID INTEGER , CreatedTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , Message TEXT)
CREATE TABLE USER ( ID TEXT PRIMARY KEY, PhoneNumber TEXT, GCMID TEXT, Email TEXT)

CREATE TABLE PLACE ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY , Name TEXT, UserID TEXT, Icon TEXT, TypeID INTEGER DEFAULT 1, Wifi TEXT, WifiConnected TEXT, GPS TEXT, GPSRadio REAL, LAC TEXT, LACRadio REAL, Mac TEXT, CreatedTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, Deleted TEXT DEFAULT 0, Updated INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
